content: r 6 1 2 3 4 5 de 7 small wings with 2 5 mm white cotton yarn r 1 7 chain 7 r 2 go back over the chain skipping the first chain and work 12 single_crochet around 6 on each side of the chain 12 r 3 12 single_crochet 12 r 4 decrease 4 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 10 r 5 10 single_crochet 10 r 6 decrease 3 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet 8 fasten_off with slip_stitch leave a strand and sew to the ball between r 13 and r 15 1 2 3 4 6 de 7 congratulations your amigurumi is now ready i hope you enjoyed the process and the result remember that you can consult your doubts by sending an email xicotetinfo@gmail com 7 de 7
